Class BBjTAPIClient


  • public class BBjTAPIClient

    2019-07-24 reading global 'BBJTAPIPORT' optionally to be able to override the default port of 12000. 2019-07-24 introducing terminateBBjTapiClient(..) to send finally 'TERMINATE:..' over the wire to the BBjTAPIClient 2019-07-24 introducing terminateAllBBjTapiClient(..) to send finally 'TERMINATE' over the wire to each registered BBjTAPIClient

    See Also:
    []

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      static voidmakeCall(BBjString extension$, BBjString number$)
      voidonIncomingCall(BBjNamespaceEvent ev!)
      voidsetCallbackForIncomingCall(BBjString extension$, BBjString label$)
      voidsetCallbackForIncomingCall(BBjString extension$, Object o!, BBjString method$)
      static voidterminateAllBBjTapiClient()

      Shut down all registered BBjTapiClient*.exe of the .Net implementation. If ::BBjTAPI.bbj::BBjTAPIServerData is running on various Terminalserver, this method needs to be called on each Terminalserver to terminate the registered BBjTapiClient*.exe instances. If BBjTapi.bbj is running only once centralized on a DataBase Server, this method needs to be called one time to terminate all BBjTapiClients.exe of the whole environment - as long each client is addressed to collaborate with the centralized ::BBjTAPI.bbj::BBjTAPIServerData instance on the DB server!

      static voidterminateBBjTapiClient(BBjString extension$)

      terminate the .NET Variant of the BBjTapiClient*.exe

        public static void terminateAllBBjTapiClient()

        Shut down all registered BBjTapiClient*.exe of the .Net implementation. If ::BBjTAPI.bbj::BBjTAPIServerData is running on various Terminalserver, this method needs to be called on each Terminalserver to terminate the registered BBjTapiClient*.exe instances. If BBjTapi.bbj is running only once centralized on a DataBase Server, this method needs to be called one time to terminate all BBjTapiClients.exe of the whole environment - as long each client is addressed to collaborate with the centralized ::BBjTAPI.bbj::BBjTAPIServerData instance on the DB server!
